We do collect information about our users to assist us in maintaining their membership. This information is used exclusively to better serve our customers and is not sold to anyone for any reason. CyberGrants, Inc. adheres to the following guidelines to protect your right to privacy

We only use your personal information to help us manage a user's account, to improve our services, provide requested product information, and to inform users about additional products or services that may be of interest to them. 

We only use your information for customer contact, account maintenance, billing, and to inform you of new features, improvements and any other customer-affecting reason. 

CyberGrants never sells your personal information to anyone or any organization. 

The CyberGrants.com website collects limited technical information about users computers. Such information includes the  TCP/IP address, browser type and domain. The information we collect is used only by CyberGrants support staff to assist us in the monitoring system performance and up-time.
